title: Default value of SDF parameter collision#ode_kp is 2147483647.0

content.raw:
The SDF specification prescribes for the `collision#ode_kp` parameter the default value of 
10^12 [1] .

However, when creating a new model in Gazebo without specifyng explicitly the kp parameters its value is 2147483647.0 :
![Screen Shot 2017-02-27 at 16.28.09.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/2580795605-Screen_Shot_2017-02-27_at_16.28.09.png)

As 2147483647.0 = 2^15-1, this is probably due to some 32 bit overflow issue. 

This has been tested in macOS Sierra with Gazebo 8. 

Even if the correctly documented value for kp is 10^12 , in my experience reasonable values for this parameter are much smaller. For this reason, fixing this bug could create problems in models that do not explicitly set the kp parameter, and implicitly assume a value of kp near to 2^15-1 ~ 2*10^9 .  

[1] : https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/src/6e4ddc6ad7be735cda1087d38cf00a60209ffd49/sdf/1.6/surface.sdf?at=sdformat5_5.0.0&fileviewer=file-view-default#surface.sdf-128 .
